page.title: 07HOUSING IN BURTON
page.content: This is a fairly representative survey of 83 family homes in Burton. Most homes are terraced or semi-detached.16% are detached,and a very small number are flats or bungalows,and all are of brick.84% are owner-occupied,the rest rented either from the Council or from employers. Housing costs average around 30 pounds per week. The average house has two living-rooms,three bedrooms,with indoor toilet and bathroom.One house has no indoor toilet,but fifteen are large houses,with four or more bedrooms. Gas fires, central heating, and cooking are most common. The homes are equipped as follows:- Cars,80%. Garage,46%. Garden,95%. TV(Col),89%. Video,46%. Radio,96%. Washer,96%. Fridge,84%. Mixer,76%. Telephone,89%. Computer,28%.
